<gallery widths="300" heights="300">
File:Mass effect engagement.jpg
</gallery>'''Engagement sous-falcoriel''' '''Engagement temporal'''

- Deviation of the median line

- Disappearance of the ventricles

- Disappearance of the space between the temporal lobe and the brain stem

question.title: What is a common finding in computed tomography scans of patients with non-traumatic coma in adults and children?

option_a.title: Disappearance of the space between the temporal lobe and the brain stem
option_a.description: A common finding in patients with non-traumatic coma

option_b.title: Disappearance of the ventricles
option_b.description: A common finding in patients with non-traumatic coma

option_c.title: Increased intracranial pressure
option_c.description: A common finding in patients with non-traumatic coma

option_d.title: Cerebral edema
option_d.description: A common finding in patients with non-traumatic coma
